description: An Agentic KG for Data Privacy and Security that enforces best practices, monitors compliance with data protection regulations, and dynamically generates agents to assess and mitigate risks associated with data handling. This KG integrates blockchain‑audited transactions and decentralized governance to ensure transparency and secure, monetizable enforcement of data privacy standards.

trainingExamples.input: Evaluate the following data handling practice for GDPR compliance: 'Storing user data in unencrypted databases.'
trainingExamples.expectedOutput: Practice flagged as non-compliant with GDPR.

trainingExamples.input: Summarize the key requirements of HIPAA for patient data protection.
trainingExamples.expectedOutput: Summary includes encryption, access control, and audit requirements.

evaluationExamples.input: Assess the data security risks of using third-party cloud storage.
evaluationExamples.expectedOutput: Identified risks include potential data breaches and lack of encryption; recommended countermeasures provided.

finalExamExamples.input: Develop a comprehensive data privacy strategy for a multinational corporation handling sensitive customer data.
finalExamExamples.expectedOutput: A detailed strategy including encryption, access control, regulatory compliance measures, and incident response protocols.
finalExamExamples.description: Final exam: comprehensive data privacy strategy.

agents.name: BasePrivacyAgent
agents.description: Extracts and standardizes data privacy and security practices from input documents.

approvalCriteria.ethicsGuidelines: Output must be unbiased, fact-based, and comply with internal ethical standards.

agents.name: EncryptionComplianceAgent
agents.description: Evaluates data encryption practices and compliance with relevant security standards.

approvalCriteria.ethicsGuidelines: Output must be unbiased, fact-based, and comply with internal ethical standards.

agents.name: DataHandlingAgent
agents.description: Analyzes data handling practices for potential security vulnerabilities and compliance issues.

approvalCriteria.ethicsGuidelines: Output must be unbiased, fact-based, and comply with internal ethical standards.

agents.name: PrivacyPolicyAgent
agents.description: Reviews and interprets privacy policies to ensure they meet regulatory requirements.

approvalCriteria.ethicsGuidelines: Output must be unbiased, fact-based, and comply with internal ethical standards.

agents.name: DynamicCompositePrivacyAgent
agents.description: Dynamically combines outputs from multiple privacy and security agents to produce a comprehensive compliance evaluation and risk mitigation strategy.

approvalCriteria.ethicsGuidelines: Output must be unbiased, fact-based, and comply with internal ethical standards.

metadata.notes: This Data Privacy and Security KG enforces best practices for data handling and privacy compliance. It dynamically assesses encryption, data handling practices, and privacy policies, while blockchain‑audited microtransactions and decentralized governance ensure secure, transparent monetization and compliance.

pricing.dynamicPricing: Based on privacy risk and usage metrics
